name: Sung Jinwoo & Igris
author: Gemini
description: A high-tier deck featuring the Shadow Monarch's infinite growth and his loyal knight.

cards.name: Ruler’s Authority
cards.rulesText: Pull one target up to 4 squares and they are Immobilized.

cards.name: Tactical Command
cards.rulesText: You and Igris each move 3 squares.

cards.name: Daily Quest Completed
cards.rulesText: Heal Jinwoo for 5 HP and remove one negative condition.

cards.name: Murderous Intent
cards.rulesText: Target enemy within 3 squares is Stunned and Vulnerable.

cards.name: Shadow Extraction
cards.rulesText: Summon two 3-HP Shadow Infantry minions adjacent to Jinwoo.

cards.name: Domain of the Monarch
cards.rulesText: All allies (including minions) are Empowered and Focused.

cards.name: Monarch’s Ascension
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to all adjacent enemies; Jinwoo then swaps places with any Shadow ally.

cards.name: Knight’s Fealty
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to an adjacent enemy.

cards.name: Precision Strike
cards.rulesText: Igris moves 3 squares and deals 3 damage to an adjacent enemy.

cards.name: Protector’s Vow
cards.rulesText: Swap Jinwoo and Igris; the next attack against Jinwoo this round is cancelled.

cards.name: Silent Vanguard
cards.rulesText: Igris moves 5 squares and gains Fortified.

cards.name: Shadow Exchange
cards.rulesText: Jinwoo and Igris may both teleport up to 6 squares.
